fullspeedLayer.description: Layer index where the fan reaches its maximum value
fullspeedLayer.label: Fullspeed Layer

smart.description: Toggle increase of fanspeed when layer printing is to fast.
smart.label: Smart Fan Mode

factor.description: Percentage the fanspeed can be increased with at most
factor.label: Maximal Increase Factor

minimalSeconds.description: If layer is printed in less than 'minimalSeconds' the fan should work harder
minimalSeconds.label: Minimal Print Time

overlap.description: Amount of overlap with the walls/skin of the model (in percentage)
overlap.label: Overlap amount

activationAngle.description: Minimal angle where support is needed (in degrees)
activationAngle.label: Activation Angle

supportPlatform.description: Toggle for support only between platform and model
supportPlatform.label: Support Platform Only Mode

supportModel.description: Toggle for support only in between the model
supportModel.label: Support Model Only Mode

XYDistance.description: Distance of the support material from the print, in the X/Y directions (same for both directions)
XYDistance.label: XY Distance

ZDistance.description: Distance from the top/bottom of the support to the print
ZDistance.label: Z distance

lineCount.description: Number of lines of skirt (0 means no skirt)
lineCount.label: Number of Lines

distance.description: Distance from the skirt to the model in microns
distance.label: Distance

combing.description: Toggle for using combing, printhead avoids voids in the model such that any oozing is done inside the model
combing.label: Combing

oozeShield.description: Toggle for using an oozeshield, a shield around the model on which an extruder can be wiped clean, mostly used for multiple extrusion
oozeShield.label: Ooze Shield

innerWallSpeed.description: Default speed of the inner walls
innerWallSpeed.label: Inner Wall Speed

outerWallSpeed.description: Default speed of the outer walls
outerWallSpeed.label: Outer Wall Speed

speedupLayers.description: Layer number where the fan reaches its maximum speed
speedupLayers.label: Speedup Layers

smart.description: Toggle for using smart fan speed
smart.label: Smart Fan Mode

minfactor.description: Percentage the fanspeed can at most reduce with
minfactor.label: Speed Reduction Factor Bound

maxfactor.description: Percentage the fanspeed can at most increase with
maxfactor.label: Speed Increase Factor Bound

minimalSeconds.description: Minimal number of seconds printing a layer should take
minimalSeconds.label: Minimal Print Time

maximalSeconds.description: Maximal number of seconds printing a layer should take
maximalSeconds.label: Maximal Print Time

numberOfLayers.description: Number of layers in the bottom region
numberOfLayers.label: Number of Layers

layerHeight.description: Height of the layers in the bottom in microns (set to 0 for default layerheigt)
layerHeight.label: Layer Height

solid.description: Toggle for solid infill in the bottomlayers
solid.label: Solid Mode

layerDelay.description: Delay in seconds before printing the next layer
layerDelay.label: Layer Delay

cutOff.description: Object sinking in microns, everything below this height is ignored by the slicer
cutOff.label: Cut Off

firstLayersWidthFactor.description: Increase of extrusion width for the first layer(s) in percentage (>100% means increase)
firstLayersWidthFactor.label: First Layer Extrusion Width Factor

numberOfLayers.description: Number of layers in the top region
numberOfLayers.label: Number of Layers

layerHeight.description: Height of the layers in the top in microns
layerHeight.label: Layer Height

solid.description: Toggle for solid infill in the toplayers
solid.label: Solid Mode

amount.description: Amount of retraction, (0 if not used)
amount.label: Retraction Amount

speed.description: Speed at which the filament is retracted
speed.label: Retraction Speed

extruderSwitch.description: Amount of retraction when switching extruder with dual-extrusion, (0 if not used)
extruderSwitch.label: Amount at Extruder Switch

minimalExtrusionBeforeRetraction.description: The minimal amount of extrusion that needs to be done before retracting again. This avoids retracting a lot on the same piece of filament.
minimalExtrusionBeforeRetraction.label: Minimal Extrusion Before Retraction

zhop.description: When retraction is done, the head is lifted by this amount to travel/hop over the print
zhop.label: Z Distance

minimalDistance.description: Minimal amount of travel needed for a retraction to happen at all
minimalDistance.label: Minimal Travel Distance

dualOverlap.description: The amount of overlap in microns when dual extruding
dualOverlap.label: Dual Overlap

spiralize.description: Toggle for spiralize, continuous change of height instead of per layer
spiralize.label: Spiralize Mode

simpleMode.description: Toggle for using simple mode, a.o. no infill and a single outline
simpleMode.label: Simple Mode

layerCoolingTime.description: Default coolingtime, seconds of delay per layer
layerCoolingTime.label: Layer Cooling Time

firstLayersAmount.description: Percentage of feedrate in the first layer(s)
firstLayersAmount.label: Feedrate in First Layer

solidLayers.description: Make a solid layer (100% infill) every 'solidLayer' layer (0 when not used)
solidLayers.label: Solid Layers

sequentialMode.description: Toggle for sequential printing, print input models after each other (when true) or at the same time (when false)
sequentialMode.label: Sequential Mode

wipeTowerSize.description: Size of (an edge of) the wipe tower, for multi extrusion
wipeTowerSize.label: Wipe Tower Size

customGcode.description: Custom gocde to add every 'repeatEvery' lines
customGcode.label: Custom Gcode

skin.description: Toggle parameters for up and down skin
skin.label: Skin

infillOverlap.description: Overlap of the skin and infill, in percentage
infillOverlap.label: Infill Overlap

upskinCount.description: Number of layers to check. Skin will be added if the intersection of a layer and the upskinCount layers above it is empty
upskinCount.label: Upskin Count

downskinCount.description: Number of layers to check. Skin will be added if the intersection of a layer and the downskinCount layers below it is empty
downskinCount.label: Downskin Count

activationAngle.description: Give all corners sharper than this ABS support (in degrees)
activationAngle.label: Activation Angle

radius.description: Radius of support circles in micron
radius.label: Radius

overlap.description: Percentage of the radius that overlaps with the model (100% means that the center of the circle is on the corner)
overlap.label: Overlap with Model

numberOfLayers.description: Number of layers in which the ABS support is added
numberOfLayers.label: Number of Layers

temperature.description: Temperature of heated bed in degrees celcius
temperature.label: Temperature

firstLayersTemperature.description: Temperature of heated bed for the first layer(s) in degrees celcius
firstLayersTemperature.label: Temperature in First Layers

xlength.description: Bed length in the x-direction in microns
xlength.label: X Length

ylength.description: Bed length in the y-direction in microns
ylength.label: Y Length

zlength.description: Bed length in the z-direction in microns
zlength.label: Z Length

extruder.description: ID of the extruder used for the brim
extruder.label: Extruder

firstLayersTemperature.description: Temperature applied to the first layer(s)
firstLayersTemperature.label: First Layers Temperature

material.description: Material used (by the extruder) for this model
material.label: Material

feedrate.description: Percentage of material fed to the extruder (100% by default)
feedrate.label: Feed Rate

filamentDiameter.description: Diameter of the filament in microns
filamentDiameter.label: Filament Diameter

nozzleSize.description: Size of the nozzle diameter in microns
nozzleSize.label: Nozzle Size

startGcode.description: Gcode to add on the top of the file
startGcode.label: Start Gcode

endGcode.description: Gcode to add on the bottom of the file
endGcode.label: End Gcode

gcodeFlavour.description: Type of gcode dialect, these are to commonly used standards
gcodeFlavour.label: Gcode Flavour

bucketIn.description: Path to where the input model(s) can be found
bucketIn.label: Bucket In

extruder.description: ID of the default extruder for this model, can be overwritten per region
extruder.label: Extruder

settings.description: ID of the regionset applied to this model (0 if not used)
settings.label: Region Set ID

finish.description: Height up until which the model should be printed (0 if the complete model should be printed)
finish.label: Finish At

x.description: X position of midpoint of the model
x.label: X position of midpoint

y.description: Y position of midpoint of the model
y.label: Y position of midpoint

z.description: Z position of midpoint of the model
z.label: Z position of midpoint

id.description: ID of the regionset the region belongs to
id.label: Region Set ID

startheight.description: Height at which the region should start
startheight.label: Start Height

endheight.description: Height at which the region should end (start of next region by default)
endheight.label: End Height

layerheight.description: Height of the layers, default layerheight if not specified (see layers)
layerheight.label: Layer Height

outerwallspeed.description: Speed for the outer wall, default outerwall speed if not specified (see movement)
outerwallspeed.label: Outer Wall Print Speed

innerwallspeed.description: Speed for the inner wall, default innerwall speed if not specified (see movement)
innerwallspeed.label: Inner Wall Print Speed

printspeed.description: Speed for normal printing, default print speed if not specified (see movement)
printspeed.label: Print Speed

infillspeed.description: Speed for the infill, default infill speed if not specified (see movement)
infillspeed.label: Infill Print Speed

infillamount.description: Percentage of infill, default amount if not specified (see infill)
infillamount.label: Infill Amount

extruder.description: ID of the extruder, default of the corresponding model if not specified
extruder.label: Extruder

fanspeed.description: Speed of the fan, determined on its height in the model if not specified
fanspeed.label: Fan Speed

coolingtime.description: Cooling time before going on with the next layer, default coolingtime if not specified (see layers)
coolingtime.label: Cooling Time

extruder.description: ID of the extruder used to print the support
extruder.label: Extruder

extruder.description: ID of the extruder used for the skirt
extruder.label: Extruder
